content.rendered:
About AeroMexico:

 

AeroMexico is Mexico’s global airline which was founded in 1934. AeroMexico operates more than 600 flights daily with hubs at the Mexico City International Airport (Terminal 2) and at the Monterrey International Airport. AeroMexico route network spans 86 destinations on four continents, including 45 destinations in Mexico, 16 in the United States, 16 in Latin America, four in Europe, three in Canada, and two in Asia. Aeromexico and Aeromexico Connect are part of Grupo Aeromexico, S.A.B. de C.V., a holding company whose subsidiaries provide commercial aviation services in Mexico and the promotion of passenger loyalty programs.

 

AeroMexico Tuxtla Gutierrez Office Address:
Blvd. Belisario Dom�nguez 302, Local No. 11, Plaza Bonampak, Colonia. Moctezuma, C.P.29030, Tuxtla Gutierrez, Mexico

Monday to Friday 09:00 – 19:00hrs., Saturday 09:00 – 15:00hrs

Map

AeroMexico Official website: https://aeromexico.com/

AeroMexico Customer care: 0800 977 5533

AeroMexico Online Check-in: www.aeromexico.com/online check-in

Check your AeroMexico flight status here: www.aeromexico.com/flightstatus

AeroMexico baggage services telephone contact numbers:
(961) 1214 379
(961) 1214 380

For AeroMexico baggage inquiries : AeroMexico baggage inquiries

AeroMexico Damaged baggage: https://aeromexico.com/en/travel-with-aeromexico/baggage/report-and-track-lost-luggage/damaged-baggage/?site=uk

Check baggage delay status / file information here: AeroMexico baggage delay status

AeroMexico Baggage lost and found:Baggage lost and found – AeroMexico

Near-by Airports: Carlos Rovirosa Pérez International Airport, Tapachula International Airport, Ángel Albino Corzo International Airport

Attractions in Tuxtla Gutierrez: Canon del Sumidero National Park, Zoologico Miguel Alvarez del Toro, Marimba Park, Faustino Miranda Park Botanical Garden
